statements: DELETE FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance WHERE company_id = 'ccf9ec76-d8b3-4aed-8367-68c20c910e3e' AND maintenance_type = 'Annual Inspection';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND staff_id = 50
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE schedule_date <= '2023-01-01' AND duration_hours > 3
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE equipment_id = 2001 AND scheduled_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE company_id = 1 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < installation_date;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 101 AND technician_id = 201;
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE equipment_id = 301 AND status = 'Pending';
